Replace.Text: 7 new featured governors have been added to the entire territory. The three technologies of pottery, animal husbandry, and mining are automatically unlocked at the beginning.

Characteristic areas of ancient times, replacing colleges. Lower construction cost (-50%), -2 base adjacent [ICON_Science] Tech points, and an additional 2 [ICON_GreatScientist] Great Scientist Points. Grants 10 Loyalty per turn.After the construction of this area is completed, the special item "Avalon Protocol" will be unlocked.

Classical era characteristic area, instead of a commercial centre. Cheaper to build (-50%). -20% cost when purchasing areas, buildings, or units in this city with [ICON_GOLD] gold and [ICON_FAITH] faith.Unlocks the featured item "{LOC_PROJECT_feast_Sutures_NAME}" when this area is built.

Medieval characteristic area, municipal union unlocked, replacing community (Industrial Age).. Cheaper to build (-50%), ignores tile charisma, and provides 6 [ICON_Housing] housing, 4 [ICON_FOOD] food, and 8 [ICON_GOLD] gold per fix.

A special area from ancient times, replacing the barracks. The cost of construction is lower (-50%), 1 [ICON_Housing] housing, which does not require population support. Clans and armies can be created by meeting Civic or Tech prerequisites and cost 25% less. Buildings within it have 2 [ICON_GOLD] gold, 1 [ICON_SCIENCE] technology.Unlocks the featured item "{LOC_PROJECT_SummonTheDead_NAME}" when this area is built.

Classical Era characteristic area, unlocked by technological ironsmithing, replaces the industrial zone (medieval). The area is free to build, and the Medieval "Apprentice" technology is unlocked immediately upon first construction. This zone adds a large number of adjacency bonuses from commercial centres, standard adjacency bonuses for resource cells, and is defensive and capable of performing ranged attacks. Each area is completed with the following effects: 1000 [ICON_GOLD] gold (at standard speed), the current city has a fixed loyalty of 100, and 1 additional buildable zone slot, but the city's [ICON_GOLD] gold output is reduced by 15%, and [ICON_Amenities] livability is -2.The area will unlock the special project "{LOC_PROJECT_EatDumplings_NAME}" upon completion of construction.

Medieval characteristic building, unlocked by the municipal administration, in place of the Historical Museum (Renaissance era). The construction cost is lower (-50%), and all three-slot museums automatically receive the theme effect after the first time the building is constructed.

Characteristic buildings of the industrial era, replacing factories. Cheaper to build (-50%), providing double the base and power [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity bonuses. Once this building is completed, the internal combustion engine technology (Hyundai) is unlocked immediately. The first time you construct this building, and each subsequent construction of an industrial zone and its interior, you will receive 1 "Greenhouse Tank" that is maintenance-free.In the city where the building is built, the special project "{LOC_PROJECT_ViewBoundEdition_NAME}" can be carried out.
Ancient Era Unique Scout unit, instead of Scout.10 base [ICON_Strength] Combat Power, and 1 free upgrade to start. This unit is produced with an additional 1 of the same unit.

Ancient Era unique melee unit that replaces the Warrior. 4 Basic [ICON_Strength] Combat Effectiveness. 10 [ICON_Strength] Combat power against a unit with higher base Combat Strength. 5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Power when fighting with a Zone.

Ancient Era unique ranged unit, instead of the Archer, can perform active melee combat. Has 3 base [ICON_Movement] movement power, 30 [ICON_Strength] melee combat power, and 25 [ICON_Strength] ranged combat power. Vision can travel through woods and rainforests, without moving debuffs.

Medieval unique melee unit that replaces armoured warriors. 7 [ICON_Strength] Combat Power when attacking, 10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Power when defending, and 5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Power when defending against ranged fire.
The god of war in white.
Featured medieval heavy cavalry unit, replacing knights. Automatically restores HP at the end of each turn. 10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Power when adjacent to at least 1 Unfinished Homeowner.

Renaissance unique heavy cavalry unit, unlocked by Tech Astronomy, in place of cuirassiers (Industrial Age). 2 [ICON_Movement] Movement power, which can be moved if there is movement force left after the battle. If the damage output is higher than that of the enemy unit, the enemy unit will be bounced into the rear cell, and if the defending unit cannot retreat, it will take more damage.

Modern Featured Heavy Cavalry units, instead of tanks, can be unlocked in advance by Featured Building Sheds. After being injured, [ICON_Strength] has no debuff in combat power. 3 [ICON_Movement] Movement Power, 3 [ICON_Strength] Combat Power per unused point of movement.

Modern unique melee unit that replaces infantry. Production and maintenance do not require strategic resource oil, maintenance cost is halved, production cost is -35%, and -5 base [ICON_Strength] combat power. 10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Power when fighting non-native.
In the information age, heavy cavalry units replace modern tanks. 5 base [ICON_Strength] combat power, with the same additional characteristics as {LOC_UNIT_TANK_Sutures_NAME}.
Missile silos that can be used to drop nuclear weapons, unlocked in the Middle Ages, can be built by builders.

Characteristic projects need to be developed in cities with knowledge deserts. After researching, all allied units gain a unique ability: -5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Damage for enemy units when adjacent to your units. When within 3 tiles of your unit, the enemy unit gains -1 [ICON_Movement] Movement.

Repeatable feature projects that need to be carried out in cities with large A casinos. During the project, the city's [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity is converted to [ICON_GOLD] gold at a rate of 200%. When the project is completed, the current [ICON_GreatMerchant] Merchant is immediately gained and 3 population points are lost (minimum population drops to 1 point population).

Characteristic projects need to be developed in cities with East Point Military Academy. After the research is completed, cities with East Point Military Academy can purchase the unique unit "Wolf Warrior Sutures" with Faith Points.When unlocking the Tech "Apprentice" and "Internal Combustion Engine", you will also receive 1 unit each.
Go to the canteen to sneakily eat dumplings.

The repeatable special project needs to be conducted in cities with a local union. During the execution of the project, the city's livability will temporarily convert at a rate of 100% into food. Upon completion of the project, the current city will gain 2 livability and lose 1% of gold output, while other allied cities will gain 1 livability.

Characteristic projects need to be developed in cities with branch trade unions. After researching: 30% of your cities outside 15 cells of the [ICON_Capital] capital are output; Cities with {LOC_DISTRICT_BranchUnion_NAME} have 15% [ICON_GOLD] Gold Output and 2 [ICON_Amenities] Habitability.

Special military combat unit with very low production cost, but the city loses 5 population after production is completed. No maintenance costs or strategic resources are required, but there is no experience to be earned and cannot be combined into a corps or army. [ICON_Strength] Combat power is anchored to the [ICON_Strength] combat power of the strongest melee type unit you have ever produced, and has 6 base [ICON_Movement] movement and 3 base vision, ignores area control,After unlocking, you can go directly into the water,And can fight in water.{LOC_ABILITY_UNIT_WMD_RESISTANCE_DESCRIPTION}{LOC_AABILITY_Wolf_Warrior_Sutures_DESCRIPTION}starts with the "Enhanced Maneuver" upgrade.When unlocking technologies corresponding to {LOC_UNIT_UnfinishedHomeowners_NAME}, {LOC_UNIT_WhiteMAMLUK_NAME}, {LOC_UNIT_POLISH_HUSSAR_Sutures_NAME}, {LOC_UNIT_TANK_Sutures_NAME}, etc., you will receive corresponding feature upgrades.When killed by a non-skill, it will lock blood and teleport to your city or capital with a monument nearby.
新增 7 个全境生效的特色总督。开局自动解锁制陶术、畜牧业、采矿业三项科技。
开局获得 30 个总督头衔。
远古时代特色区域，代替学院。建造费用更低（-50%），-2 基础相邻 [ICON_Science]科技值，额外产出 2 点 [ICON_GreatScientist]大科学家点数。每回合提供 +10 忠诚度。该区域建造完成后解锁特色项目“阿瓦隆协议”。
古典时代特色区域，代替商业中心。建造费用更低（-50%）。使用 [ICON_GOLD]金币和 [ICON_FAITH]信仰值在此城市中购买区域、建筑、单位时，-20% 花费。该区域建造完成后解锁特色项目“{LOC_PROJECT_feast_Sutures_NAME}”。
中世纪特色区域，市政工会解锁，代替社区（工业时代）。建造费用更低（-50%），无视单元格魅力值，每个固定提供 +6 [ICON_Housing]住房，+4 [ICON_FOOD]食物，+8 [ICON_GOLD]金币。每个该区域每回合 -6 忠诚度。
远古时代特色区域，代替军营。建造费用更低（-50%），+1 [ICON_Housing] 住房，不需要人口支持。满足市政或科技先决条件后即可创建军团和军队，并降低其 25% 的花费。其内的建筑 +2 [ICON_GOLD] 金币、+1 [ICON_SCIENCE] 科技值。该区域建造完成后解锁特色项目“{LOC_PROJECT_SummonTheDead_NAME}”。

古典时代特色区域，由科技炼铁术解锁，代替工业区（中世纪）。该区域建造免费，并且首次建成后立即解锁中世纪的“学徒”科技。该区域增加来自商业中心的大量相邻加成、资源单元格的标准相邻加成，具有防御力且可执行远程攻击。每个该区域建成后获得如下效果：获得 1000 [ICON_GOLD]金币（标准速度下）、当前城市固定忠诚度为 100 且获得 1 个额外的可建造区域位，但是该城市的 [ICON_GOLD]金币产出降低 15%，[ICON_Amenities]宜居度 -2。该区域建造完成后解锁特色项目“{LOC_PROJECT_EatDumplings_NAME}”。
中世纪特色建筑，由市政行政部门解锁，代替历史博物馆（文艺复兴时代）。建造费用更低（-50%），第一次建造此建筑后，所有的三槽位博物馆都会自动获得主题效果。
工业时代特色建筑，代替工厂。建造费用更低（-50%），提供的基础和供电 [ICON_PRODUCTION]生产力加成翻倍。建成此建筑后，立即解锁内燃机科技（现代）。第一次建造此建筑及之后每修建一个工业区及其内建筑时，都会获得 1 个免资源维护的 “大棚的坦克”。在修建了该建筑的城市可进行特色项目“{LOC_PROJECT_ViewBoundEdition_NAME}”。
远古时代特色侦察单位，代替侦察兵。+10 基础 [ICON_Strength]战斗力 ，初始就有 1 次免费升级。该单位生产时会额外获得 1 个相同的单位。
远古时代特色近战单位，代替勇士。+4 基础 [ICON_Strength]战斗力。与拥有更高基础战斗力的单位作战时+10 [ICON_Strength] 战斗力。与区域作战时+5 [ICON_Strength] 战斗力。
远古时代特色远程单位，代替弓箭手，可以主动进行近战。拥有 3 点基础 [ICON_Movement]移动力、30 点 [ICON_Strength]近战战斗力 和 25 点 [ICON_Strength]远程战斗力。视野可以穿过树林和雨林，穿行雨林和树林时没有移动减益。
中世纪特色近战单位，代替披甲战士。进攻时 +7 [ICON_Strength]战斗力，防御时 +10 [ICON_Strength]战斗力，防御远程射击时额外 +5 [ICON_Strength]战斗力。
中世纪特色重骑兵单位，代替骑士。每回合结束时自动回复血量。与至少 1 个烂尾房主相邻时 +10 [ICON_Strength]战斗力。
文艺复兴时代特色重骑兵单位，由科技天文学解锁，代替胸甲骑兵（工业时代）。+2 [ICON_Movement]移动力，如果战斗后有剩余移动力，可以移动。如果输出伤害高于敌方单位，会将敌方单位弹到后方的单元格中，如果防守的单位无法后退，会受到更高的伤害。
现代特色重骑兵单位，代替坦克，可由特色建筑工业大棚提前解锁。受伤后 [ICON_Strength]战斗力无减益。+3 [ICON_Movement]移动力，每点未使用的移动力 +3 [ICON_Strength]战斗力。
现代特色近战单位，代替步兵。生产和维护不需要战略资源石油，维护费用减半，生产费用 -35%，-5 基础 [ICON_Strength]战斗力。非本土作战时 +10 [ICON_Strength]战斗力。
信息时代特色重骑兵单位，代替现代坦克。+5 基础 [ICON_Strength]战斗力，拥有和{LOC_UNIT_TANK_Sutures_NAME}一样的额外特性。
可以投放核武器的导弹发射井，中世纪即可解锁，可以由建造者修建。
特色项目，需要在有知识荒漠的城市进行研发。研发完成后，所有的己方单位获得一项特色能力：相邻己方单位时，敌方单位 -5 [ICON_Strength]战斗力。位于己方单位 3 个单元格内时，敌方单位 -1 [ICON_Movement]移动力。
可重复的特色项目，需要在有大 A 赌场的城市进行。项目执行期间，该城市的 [ICON_PRODUCTION]生产力会以 200% 的比例转换为 [ICON_GOLD]金币。当项目完成时，会立即获得当前的 [ICON_GreatMerchant]大商人，并损失 3 点人口（最低降到 1 点人口）。
特色项目，需要在有东点军校的城市进行研发。研发完成后，有{LOC_DISTRICT_EastPointMilitaryAcademy_NAME}的城市可以通过信仰值购买特色单位“{LOC_UNIT_Wolf_Warrior_Sutures_NAME}”。在解锁科技“学徒”和“内燃机”时也会分别赠送 1 个该单位。
可重复的特色项目，需要在有支部工会的城市进行。项目执行期间，城市暂时 +3 [ICON_Amenities]宜居度，生产力会以 100% 比例转换为 [ICON_FOOD]食物。项目完成后，当前城市获得 +2 宜居度、-1% [ICON_GOLD]金币产出，其他己方城市获得 +1 [ICON_Amenities]宜居度。
特色项目，需要在有支部工会的城市进行研发。研发完成后：距离 [ICON_Capital]首都 15 个单元格之外的己方城市 +30% 全部产出；有{LOC_DISTRICT_BranchUnion_NAME}的城市 +15% [ICON_GOLD]金币产出、+2 [ICON_Amenities]宜居度。

特殊军事战斗单位，生产花费极低，但是生产完成后该城市会损失 5 人口。不需要维护费用和战略资源，但是也无法获取经验值，无法合成为兵团或者军队。[ICON_Strength] 战斗力锚定为己方生产过的最强近战类型单位的 [ICON_Strength]战斗力，拥有 6 点基础 [ICON_Movement]移动力和 3 点基础视野，无视区域控制，解锁后可以直接下水，并且可以在水域中战斗。{LOC_ABILITY_UNIT_WMD_RESISTANCE_DESCRIPTION}{LOC_AABILITY_Wolf_Warrior_Sutures_DESCRIPTION}初始就拥有“增强机动”升级。在解锁{LOC_UNIT_UnfinishedHomeowners_NAME}、{LOC_UNIT_WhiteMAMLUK_NAME}、{LOC_UNIT_POLISH_HUSSAR_Sutures_NAME}、{LOC_UNIT_TANK_Sutures_NAME}等兵种对应的科技时，会获得其对应的特性升级。被非技能击杀时会锁血，并且传送到附近有纪念碑的己方城市或者首都。
